https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vjLXXHUAOWFWkL3fUkkkLu0AWnm.jpg After succumbing to a night of passion with gorgeous Kate Collins, married Eric Roarke discovers the mysterious temptress won't give him up easily. Eric's life spirals out of control as Kate's increasingly possessive behavior threatens his marriage and his life. Desire and Deception
